Job Title: Construction Inspector

Location: Dover, DE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Design, Engineering, Science

Description:
Job Description

Century Engineering, LLC, a Kleinfelder Company, is a multidisciplinary professional services firm offering a broad range of services to include consulting, engineering, environmental, planning, design, and construction services. With a dedicated staff of over 600 technical and administrative personnel throughout the Mid-Atlantic region, we provide our clients with quality, innovative and value-added professional services in many specialized areas. Orientated around our employees first, Century provides competitive salaries and an excellent comprehensive benefits package which includes a 401k retirement plan, paid holidays, paid leave time and various employee perks and discounts. In addition to offering a challenging and diverse work environment, Century's culture encourages community service, continued learning, personal growth and fun!

Are you ready to be challenged, make a difference, and experience professional growth in your career? Kleinfelder's Construction Services team is looking for you! Working within our construction management and observation/inspection services section, our Construction Services market helps to develop and maintain America's infrastructure and supply chain and is a recognized industry leader.

Inspections may be general in nature or limited to a specific area, such as Transportation infrastructure, Roads, Bridges and ancillary transportation facilities. Under limited supervision from a Supervisor/Manager, the candidate will work within specific guidelines and protocols on moderately complex assignments.

Responsibilities:

 Inspects and monitors construction sites and the various work activities on these sites to verify adherence to standards, codes and specifications; takes action according to findings. Prepares daily reports documenting inspections and other relevant project information. Verifies lines and grades of project improvements. Performs quantity calculations for pay estimates. Performs analytical calculations such as basic earthwork, grading, and profiles. Performs labor compliance interviews as necessary. Communicates verbally and in writing with Contractor and Owner as directed.

Qualifications:

 3+ years of direct knowledge of horizontal transportation projects including experience with soils, aggregate, concrete, and/or hot mix asphalt. High school diploma or equivalent, Associate's degree or equivalent from two year college or technical school preferred with course work in transportation related courses, Construction Technology and Mathematics. Preferred certifications in NICET, ACI concrete, and/or ATSSA certification.

No relocation assistance available for this position. Local residency or ability to relocate at your own expense is required.

Century Engineering, LLC, a Kleinfelder Company, is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. Committed to employment equality, employment selections and related decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status. Century ensures nondiscrimination in all programs and activities in accordance with all applicable laws and is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with disabilities. If a medical condition or disability necessitates a reasonable accommodation for any part of this application process, please contact Human Resources or call 443-589-2400 (MD, DE, PA) 804-644-4600 (VA) and ask to speak with a Human Resources representative.

Equal Opportunity Employer of Disabilities/Veterans

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
